Welcome to ivPID’s documentation!¶

Python PID Controller Simple implementation of a Proportional-Integral-Derivative (PID) Controller. PID controller gives output value for error between desired reference input and measurement feedback to minimize error value. More information: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PID_controller

class PID.PID(P=2.0, I=0.0, D=1.0)¶

PID Controller

clear()¶

Clears PID computations and coefficients

setKd(D)¶

Sets Derivative Coefficient

setKi(I)¶

Sets Integral Coefficient

setKp(P)¶

Sets Proportional Coefficient

setSampleTime(sample_time)¶

Sets PID Computation Time Interval

setWindup(W)¶

Sets Windup Guard Limit

update(feedback_value)¶

Calculates PID value for given reference input and feedback
